INTRO.LABEL: 1. Introduction
INTRO.TEXT: This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect personal information obtained through our mobile application. By using our app, you agree to the terms outlined in this policy.

INFORMATION.LABEL: 2. Information We Collect
INFORMATION.TEXT: We collect the following types of personal information:
LIST: • User Data: This includes data provided during account registration, such as name, email address, and other relevant details.
• Usage Data: We collect information about how users interact with our app, including device information, IP addresses, and browsing behavior.

HOW.LABEL: 3. How We Collect Information
HOW.TEXT: We collect personal information through the following methods:
LIST: • User Input: Users voluntarily provide information during account setup and usage.
• Automated Collection: We use cookies and similar technologies to collect usage data.

AIM.LABEL: 4. Purpose of Data Collection
AIM.TEXT: We collect personal information for the following purposes:
LIST: • App Functionality: To provide essential app features and services.
• Communication: To send notifications, updates, and relevant information.
• Analytics: To improve app performance and user experience.

SHARE.LABEL: 5. Data Sharing
SHARE.TEXT: We may share personal information with the following parties:
LIST: • Visa Administrator User: User data will be transferred to the Visa Administrator for processing.
• Service Providers: Third-party service providers who assist in app functionality.
• Legal Requirements: If required by law or legal process.

CONTROL.LABEL: 6. User Control
CONTROL.TEXT: Users can control their data by:
LIST: • Opt-Out: Choosing not to receive notifications or marketing communications.

SAVE_DELETE.LABEL: 7. Data Retention and Deletion
LIST: • Retention Period: We retain user data for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy or as required by law.
• Deletion: Users can request data deletion by contacting us at admin@theark.studio Upon request, we will delete personal information unless retention is necessary for legal compliance.

SECURITY.LABEL: 8. Security Measures
SECURITY.TEXT: We take reasonable steps to protect user data from unauthorized access, disclosure, or alteration.

PRIVATE_POLICY.LABEL: 9. Changes to Privacy Policy
PRIVATE_POLICY.TEXT: We reserve the right to update this Privacy Policy. Users will be notified of any changes.

CONTACT.LABEL: 10. Contact Information
CONTACT.TEXT: For questions or concerns regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact us at admin@theark.studio.
